metadata.Title: CVE-2022-1437 on Ubuntu 20.04 ESM (focal) - medium.
metadata.Description: Heap-based Buffer Overflow in GitHub repository radareorg/radare2 prior to 5.7.0. The bug causes the program reads data past the end of the intented buffer. Typically, this can allow attackers to read sensitive information from other memory locations or cause a crash.

criterions.comment: radare2 package in focal is affected and may need fixing.
